SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_SETPREVIOUSANDTRANSFERPROJECTS_BYLOCATIONID
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Used to set PREVIOUSCHILDPROJECTID and TRANSFERCHILDPROJCTID on a sponsor type of interaction extension
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_INTERACTION_SPONSOR_SETPREVIOUSANDTRANSFERPROJECTS_BYLOCATIONID ( @interactionID uniqueidentifier = null, -- Interaction ID of the interaction to add the departed child to @previousLocationID uniqueidentifier = null, -- The ID of the sponsorship location the child is transferring from @transferLocationID uniqueidentifier = null, -- The ID of child the sponsorship location the child is transferring to @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier = null -- Used to track who updated the interaction, retrieved with USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT if null ) as begin declare @previousChildProjectID uniqueidentifier = null -- The child project id of the project the child is transferring from declare @transferChildProjectID uniqueidentifier = null -- The child project id of the project the child is transferring to
-- Used for setting date fields to today's date declare @currentDate datetime = null set @currentDate = getdate()
begin try -- Get ChangeAgent if none was passed into the sproc if @changeAgentID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @changeAgentID output
if @interactionID is null raiserror('Interaction ID cannot be null',16,1);
select @previousChildProjectID = FIELDOFFICEID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION where ID = @previousLocationID
if @previousChildProjectID is null raiserror('Field office for Previous Location is not configured.',16,1);
select @transferChildProjectID = FIELDOFFICEID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION where ID = @transferLocationID
if @transferChildProjectID is null raiserror('Field office for Transfer Location is not configured.',16,1);
update dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION set PREVIOUSCHILDPROJECTID = @previousChildProjectID, TRANSFERCHILDPROJECTID = @transferChildProjectID, CHANGEDBYID = @changeAgentID, DATECHANGED = @currentDate where ID = @interactionID
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0 end
